resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

cameraEntityId.name: cameraEntityId
cameraEntityId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
cameraEntityId.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.hint: The name of the output binary field to put the file in

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

eventType.name: eventType
eventType.description: The Entity ID for which an event will be created
eventType.ai_hint: The Entity ID for which an event will be created

eventAttributes.name: eventAttributes
eventAttributes.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

domain.name: domain
domain.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
domain.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

service.name: service
service.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
service.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

serviceAttributes.name: serviceAttributes
serviceAttributes.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

entityId.name: entityId
entityId.description: The entity ID for which a state will be created. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
entityId.ai_hint: The entity ID for which a state will be created. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

stateAttributes.name: stateAttributes
stateAttributes.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

template.name: template
template.description: Render a Home Assistant template. See template docs for more information..
template.ai_hint: Render a Home Assistant template. See template docs for more information..

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'cameraProxy' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'getScreenshot' AND resource == 'cameraProxy' THEN SHOW parameter 'cameraEntityId'
IF operation == 'getScreenshot' AND resource == 'cameraProxy' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF resource == 'config' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'event' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'event' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'event' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'event' THEN SHOW parameter 'eventType'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'eventAttributes'
IF resource == 'history' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'history' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'history' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'history' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'log' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'log' AND operation == 'getLogbookEntries' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'service' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'service' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'service' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'service' AND operation == 'call' THEN SHOW parameter 'domain'
IF resource == 'service' AND operation == 'call' THEN SHOW parameter 'service'
IF resource == 'service' AND operation == 'call' THEN SHOW parameter 'serviceAttributes'
IF resource == 'state' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'state' THEN SHOW parameter 'entityId'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'state' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'state' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'upsert' AND resource == 'state' THEN SHOW parameter 'entityId'
IF resource == 'state' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'state'
IF resource == 'state' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'stateAttributes'
IF resource == 'template' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'template' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'template'
